TopicTitle: [WIP] NohArk's Pick and Pull - Space Tug DEV 0.4

Articles.Content: Is...Is..Is that a Quad-Cannon front armament??!!
I think I'm in love......That is so badass. I guess you're using BDArmory?

that's just the sun rise. actual firing is not nearly as dramatic. If I can figure out how BD's module works yea. but so far I haven't been successful and he's not very forthcoming with information.

but at least there will be few basic IVAs fro the cockpits.

Edited September 14, 2014 by nli2work
When do you estimate a release? I need a proper gunsight :|

When do you estimate a release? I need a proper gunsight :|

This weekend maybe. I gotta do the tedious process of readjusting all the velocity and atmosphere curves.

but some fun before doing that...

You inspired me to make my 109 mod! This mod is never leaving my KSP now!

Hey btw, if you can, i need some help making my IVA work in ksp :s

Cheers!

IVAs taking shape...

Standard props vs RPM props

IVAs taking shape...

Standard props vs RPM props

http://i.imgur.com/0qJYjTe.jpg

is that a rear view mirror on the top?
if you run RPM, yep
So i never got to the point of trying and using rpm, saw your your thread yesterday and those cockpits and i had to try it. You sir, deserve an applaud and an nice hat! Kudos man

I love it.

I wonder, did you think about making a larger, square fuselage? Something like the Osprey, or maybe transport helos. I just noticed there is has been no such thing made for KSP, at least as far as I found out. B9 does have parts that kinda-sorta fit, but not really. Also, a cargo bay for the rectangular fuselage would be nice, preferably opening to the sides (like B9 M2 parts).

I love it.

I wonder, did you think about making a larger, square fuselage? Something like the Osprey, or maybe transport helos. I just noticed there is has been no such thing made for KSP, at least as far as I found out. B9 does have parts that kinda-sorta fit, but not really. Also, a cargo bay for the rectangular fuselage would be nice, preferably opening to the sides (like B9 M2 parts).

hm Osprey does look pretty cool. would be good way to expand into larger parts after I round out smaller parts into space plane field... tandem 2 seater larger cockpit like Osprey would make nice IVA too.

Firespitter up to date? ModuleManager installed correctly? neither have duplicates floating around Gamedata?

Edited September 24, 2014 by nli2work
I never saw anything about ModuleManager. It's not in the main post.

I never saw anything about ModuleManager. It's not in the main post.

RF doesn't strictly require MM; but I believe Firespitter does.

At any rate ModuleManager is all but stock, considering how many mods use it to various extent. It should always be kept up to date; unless you don't run any mods at all.
